description:
Wise asses, step this way. Because this graphic tee (practically) has your name on it. Makes for a great gift too for that certain someone who always has to have the last word...

Speaking of words, there's a word we love around here: Fair. And this tee was made in a Fair Trade Certified™ factory which means it empowers workers while protecting the environment too.
name: Prana Wise Ass Journeyman 2 - Slim - Mens
